title: Create the policy and apply the filter with CCL tag
custom_steps:
"1. Create a few policies, one of the policy should be a category based policy with CCL app tag
2. Add new filters for  CCL App Tag in policy listing page
3. Verify that only the policy with cci app tag should be shown in the policy listing page
4. Also verify with For CCL App Tag filter the dropdown options will be getting populated"
custom_expected: Verify that after applying CCL filter, policy listing page should see policies with only CCL tag
